label: Backup
info: Nodes for backing up data. Useful to hide flows elements that aren't pertinant to the task at hand.

label: CPU Monitoring
info:
Processor and resource monitoring.

This gets copied and pasted around a lot, so lets keep all the pieces in this flow.

Local caching of chart data is write limited to help protect the SD card. 10 minutes between writes. Uses links for refreshing the charts on restart for ease of reading the useful flows.

command: sudo apt-get -qq update; sudo apt-get -qq upgrade -y; cd ~/.node-red/; npm update --quiet

Load Charts on restart
info: Load the cached chart data on restart. This helps provide continuity of CPU stats and can provide insight into why the computer may have been having issues.

name: Cache the chart data
info: Cache the chart data every 10 minutes. This should help reduce the charts writing the SD card to death.
